name: The Sound Of Life
description:
The Sound Of Life 

 To Aviv - Secret Santa Jam 2021 

 A short point and click adventure game about a girl who wishes to see her father one last time.  

 This was made for the Secret Santa Jam 2021 and went horribly over time but happy with how it turned out! 

(Just a side note sometimes if you interact with a object the game will stop receiving inputs for about 10 seconds but then be normal, this is just workaround for a problem that popped up and not the most elegant solution but it works!) 

 Music by Edmund Ng - https://linktr.ee/edngmusic?utm_source=linktree_profile_share
